name: flush-all
description: Flushes all open buffers in your Node.js app.

scripts.test: nave use 0.11 node-gyp rebuild && nave use 0.11 node --perf-basic-prof ./test/flush-all.js
scripts.test-13: echo 'expects node-v0.13 to be checked out at ./node-v0.13' && export PATH=`pwd`/node-v0.13:$PATH && node-gyp rebuild --nodedir ./node-v0.13 && node --perf-basic-prof ./test/flush-all.js
